products.name: Hydrance UV-Rich SPF30
products.info: Hydrate your skin while protecting it daily against UV, free radicals, and pollution. It's rich, velvety texture leaves the skin soft, supple and luminous all day long.

products.name: Lipikar AP+M
products.info: If you have extremely sensitive and dry skin, and it’s been difficult to find a body lotion that actually does the job. By using the Lipikar Balm AP+ from La Roche-Posay for a few months will leave your skin feeling moisturized all day long without having to reapply it every few hours. Plus, it’s really affordable! Win win.

products.name: Lait-Creme Concentre
products.info: Embryolisse’s Lait-Crème Concentré is super moisturizing without being too thick or heavy on the surface of the skin and works well all year round. A hero product, indeed!

products.name: Glow Daily Vitamin C Gel Cream
products.info: After using this gel-cream for a few months you'll notice how much your skin will glow before you’d even put on makeup. It's the product that will make you feel more confident to go out sans base product.

products.name: C-Rush Brightening
products.info: The daily effects of stress, fatigue, and pollution can leave skin looking dry and dull. Fight back with this vegan C-Rush Brightening Gel Crème. This innovative, peachy-tinted gel crème instantly illuminates and delivers an energizing burst of 24-hour hydration.

products.name: Vita Mineral Daily Supplement
products.info: This vegan multi-active cream that replenishes the skin with moisture and vital nutrients. Powerful antioxidants, trace elements and vitamins further protect and energise the skin's appearance.
